name: stripe
title: Stripe
description: Manage payments, subscriptions, and customers seamlessly. Execute workflows on charge failures and subscription updates.

origin.description: The origin of the event trigger

data.description: The data to send with the event

object.description: The object of the failed charge

chargeFailed.title: Charge Failed
chargeFailed.description: This event occurs when a charge fails in Stripe.

origin.description: The origin of the event trigger

data.description: The data to send with the event

object.description: The object of the deleted subscription

subscriptionDeleted.title: Subscription Deleted
subscriptionDeleted.description: This event occurs when a subscription is canceled/deleted in Stripe.

origin.description: The origin of the event trigger

data.description: The data to send with the event

object.description: The object of the updated subscription

subscriptionUpdated.title: Subscription Updated
subscriptionUpdated.description: This event occurs when a subscription is updated in Stripe. For example when the subscription is cancelled, but does not terminate immediately cancel_at_period_end goes to true.

origin.description: The origin of the event trigger

data.description: The data to send with the event

object.description: The object of the created subscription

subscriptionCreated.title: Subscription Created
subscriptionCreated.description: This event occurs when a subscription is created in Stripe. For example when the subscription is cancelled, but does not terminate immediately cancel_at_period_end goes to true.

origin.description: The origin of the event trigger

data.description: The data to send with the event

object.description: The object of the invoice whose payment failed

invoicePaymentFailed.title: Invoice Payment Failed
invoicePaymentFailed.description: This event occurs when an invoice payment fails in Stripe.

origin.description: The origin of the event trigger

data.description: The data to send with the event

object.description: The object of the payment intent that failed

paymentIntentFailed.title: Payment Intent Failed
paymentIntentFailed.description: This event occurs when a payment intent fails in Stripe.

origin.description: The origin of the event trigger

data.description: The data to send with the event

object.description: The object of the created subscription schedule

subscriptionScheduleCreated.title: Subscription Schedule Created
subscriptionScheduleCreated.description: This event occurs when a subscription schedule is created in Stripe.

origin.description: The origin of the event trigger

data.description: The data to send with the event

object.description: The object of the updated subscription schedule

subscriptionScheduleUpdated.title: Subscription Schedule Updated
subscriptionScheduleUpdated.description: This event occurs when a subscription schedule is updated in Stripe.

productName.description: The name of the product to be sold
The name of the subscription product

url.description: The URL of the payment link

id.description: The payment link ID to deactivate
The ID of the customer to retrieve
